F_n = F_(n-1) + F_(n-2)

0 0
1 1
2 1
3 2
4 3

32 2178309
33 3524578

2 + 8 + 34 + 144 + 610 + 2584 + 10946 + 46368 + 196418 + 832040 + 3524578 = 4613732

(Something I didn't notice while solving the problem by programming: only terms that are multiples of 3 need to be added, up to and including F_33.)
